text: 'innama yaqbal allah altawbat min aladhin yrtkbwn almeasy waldhnwb bjhl minhum leaqbtha, w'iyjabha lskht allah -fkl eas lilah mkhtyana 'aw mtemmidana fahu jahl bhdha alaetbar, wa'iin kan ealmana balthrym -thm yurjaeun 'iilaa rabihim bal'inabt waltaet qabl meaynt almwt, fawlyk yaqbal allah twbthm. wakan allah elymana bkhlqh, hkymana fi tdbyrh wtqdyrh
